title: Why is League running 3 clients in Background Processes
body:
Before the Alpha client league used to run 1 client in the task manager but now alpha is setting up 3 clients plus the game in the task manager. I know Alpha is suppose to be graphical and all but why the extra clients. Im finding that the game tends to load a little slower than normal.. 

Also another thing just curios is there or will be a 64bit version of the game...

replies.body:
I have the same problem. 3 LoL clients are in task manager. Each taking different amounts of CPU and RAM percentages...

The game is considerably slower in game as well as champ select. I use to average 30-40 Fps and now I'm lucky to get 20. Please change to the old client. Sure the new one looks cool but it doesn't do much.
